title: June 2019 update has hurt my Pixel 2XL
content:
After the June update (installed Saturday morning I think), my phone will no longer recognize that it has a fingerprint scanner. To make matters worse, there is a very noticeable and very frustrating stutter in its performance (specifically while typing but other activities demonstrate it as well).

I have attempted the safe mode restart, the factory reset, and trimming things off of the storage. I have also switched from the SwiftKey keyboard that I was using and it hasn't helped anything either.

Nothing has worked. Help me please!

Is it possible to select the prior version (pre-June update) and just roll with that until a stable version becomes available?

Thank you, 
Bruce
